greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A000012 * A047999
formula: Triangle read by rows, A000012 * A047999; where A000012 = an infinite lower triangular matrix with all 1's: [1; 1,1; 1,1,1;..]; and A047999 = Sierpinski's gasket.
The operation takes partial sums of Sierpinski's gasket terms, by columns.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
